sentences.sContent: Systems engineering has been widely applied in the oilfield exploitation and construction.
sentences.sContent_eng: Systems engineering has been widely applied in the oilfield exploitation and construction.
sentences.sCn: 近年来，系统工程学在油田开发建设中应用广泛。

sentences.sContent: One partial solution to our energy problems lies not in the oilfield but in the cornfield, as nations increasingly replace some petroleum needs with bioenergy — fuel made from plants.
sentences.sContent_eng: One partial solution to our energy problems lies not in the oilfield but in the cornfield, as nations increasingly replace some petroleum needs with bioenergy — fuel made from plants.
sentences.sCn: 解决能源危机的新出路不在油田，而可能在农田；世界各国正在用生物能源——从植物中提取的燃料——取代对部分石油制品的需求。

trans.tranOther: an area of land or sea under which there is oil
